title: President Tebboune addresses a written message to the Emir of the State of Qatar
text: The President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune sent, today, a written message to his brother, the Emir of the State of Qatar, brotherly country, His Highness Sheikh Tamim Ben Hamad Al-Thani, as part of the permanent contact between the leaders of the two countries, and the privileged ties of brotherhood and the common will that animates them to promote the Algerian-Qatari relations to higher levels and to continue the efforts to defend the causes of the Arab nation.

The message was delivered by Ambassador Boudjemaa Delmi, Director General of the Algerian Agency for International Cooperation for Solidarity and Development, in his capacity as special envoy of the President of the Republic, who was received today in Doha by the Emir of the State of Qatar.
